short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate engaging twitter replies with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your X/Twitter game with real-time, AI-generated reply suggestions directly within your Chrome browser. Whether you're a seasoned tweeter or new to the platform, our extension ensures that your replies are sharp, engaging, and contextually relevant.
